Title: KDE Plasma Workspaces: Multiple vulnerabilities
Synopsis:
Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in KDE Plasma Workspaces,
    the worst of which allows local attackers to execute arbitrary commands.

Background.Text: KDE Plasma workspace is a widget based desktop environment designed to be fast and efficient.

Description.Text: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in KDE Plasma Workspaces. Please review the referenced CVE identifiers for details.

Impact.Text: An attacker could execute arbitrary commands via specially crafted thumb driveâ€™s volume labels or obtain sensitive information via specially crafted notifications.

Workaround.Text:
Users should mount removable devices with Dolphin instead of the device notifier.

Users should disable notifications.

P.Text: All KDE Plasma Workspace users should upgrade to the latest version:
